Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wisper.cli.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of input parameters.
    Author:
    Tobias Marstaller

      • add

        public void add(Environment env,
       java.lang.String paramStr)
         throws ParseException
        Adds the flags and options contained in args to this input accodring to env.
        Parameters:
        env - The environment settings to follow when parsing args
        paramStr - A string containing the input parameters, e.g. "-v --input foo.txt"
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is an odd parameter.
        ParseException - If a quoted parameter has no ending ".

      • add

        public void add(Environment env,
       java.lang.String[] args)
         throws ParseException
        Adds the flags and options contained in args to this input accodring to env.
        Parameters:
        env - The environment settings to follow when parsing args
        args - The input parameters to parse.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is an odd parameter.
        ParseException
